  "authors": "V.N. Tolstoy (INP, Moscow State University)",
  "title": "Quantum Deformations of Relativistic Symmetries",
  "comments": "10 pages. Invited talk at the XXII Max Born Symposium \"Quantum, Super\n  and Twistors\", September 27-29, 2006, Wroclaw (Poland), in honour of Jerzy\n  Lukierski.",
  "journal-ref": null,
  "doi": null,
  "report-no": null,
  "categories": "math.QA hep-th math-ph math.MP math.RT",
  "license": null,
  "abstract": "  We discussed quantum deformations of D=4 Lorentz and Poincare algebras. In\nthe case of Poincare algebra it is shown that almost all classical r-matrices\nof S. Zakrzewski classification correspond to twisted deformations of Abelian\nand Jordanian types. A part of twists corresponding to the r-matrices of\nZakrzewski classification are given in explicit form.\n",
